profile_positions.description: AIDS Healthcare Foundation provides cutting edge  HIV/AIDS medical treatment, prevention and advocacy for all in need, regardless of ability to pay. By 2018 more than one million patients were receiving antiretroviral treatment in >500 AHF supported  facilities spread over 42 countries in 4 continents (Africa, Asia, Latin America & Caribbean and Europe). Continuous quality improvement is a strong component of AHF’s emphasis on the quality of the programs it implements and the services it provides. AHF is expanding its quality improvement activities by establishing a solid management structure for the quality component in their global programs, building on its rapid growth and achievements in the past years. This process is guided by the Global Quality Team .

profile_positions.description:
WHO TB and leprosy Advisor to the TB & Leprosy Programme, Ministry of Health Ethiopia.  
The WHO advisor worked with the TB and leprosy control team at the Ministry of Health in implementing nationwide TBL control as part of the general health services, using the DOTS strategy. Daily duties include facilitation and support in DOTS expansion, HIV/AIDS/TB collaboration, training, IEC,  drug and supply management, disease surveillance, donor coordination, planning and supervision.  Advisory assignments included various research projects related to TB. Leverage of funds to implement TB and leprosy control was key, with approved Global Funds proposal and major funding from bilaterals and multilaterals. 
In addition the WHO advisor replaced WR during his periods of absence from office and was a professional officer in the multidisciplinary team of WHO professional core staff (HIV/AIDS, CDC, EHA, Malaria, FH). He was a facilitator at International TB Leprosy Courses at the ALERT Training Institute, with focus on TB epidemiology, TB/HIV co-infection issues and operational research in TB. The advisor was the secretary for the Horn of Africa TB Initiative (HATCI) for liaison with Horn of Africa Initiative (HOAI). The advisor functioned as an external examiner for Masters Courses of the Addis Ababa University
